I just received this in my email from Mr. Hillsborough and thought you'd 
all be interested....

My publisher tells me that the official publication date is January 2005. I
think they might be available earlier. Amazon.com seems to already be taking
orders at a big discount. But all of this business is out of my hands.
Best regards,
Romulus Hillsborough>>
